name: Worlds Fall (Demo) RPG
description:
DISCLAIMER: Game is still very early in development, this demo contains one level, several choices, and several endings. this showcases the final level in "Worlds fall"

BioPixel Interactive is a dev team of 2 for the time being and this is our first "game" out in the market.

Worlds Fall is a game where you play as "Tobias Dunn" who must fight his way up a huge tower with multiple levels and segments, you meet two others during this journey, Venus Litehart and Bellemere Moon, who become two of your greatest friends. You must make choices that can and will lead to life or death. You decide in Worlds Fall.
